comment: "Great editing, sometimes intense, but it makes the stories better. Editor trusts my judgment and expertise about the subject matter. I think I've had to earn that, but the editorial relationship is now one of mutual respect and functions well."
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Expenses were paid promptly after two reporting trips. Length of time reporting and upheaval at the magazine meant my first two editors departed."
relationship: Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)
Solicited pitch (editor asked you to pitch)
